channel.title: status on CS-AWARE-NEXT
channel.description: Recent content in status on CS-AWARE-NEXT

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello world! Welcome to join our journey with CS-AWARE-NEXT, a cyber security research project funded by European Union’s Horizon Europe research and innovation programme! We will be updating the project’s progress and informing you about our arranged events and achieved results in this page with brief blog posts. If you are interested to follow our progress, make sure to follow us on Twitter to get notified when new posts are added so you don’t miss them!
